import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {NavigationService} from "./shared/navigation.service"; @Component({ selector: 'ics-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'ics'; constructor(public navigationService: NavigationService) { } }
